modName: -Vore- devourment skeleton replacer for female beast race- shield on back
summary: skeleton replacer for beast race with shield on back with other adjustments for use with devourment a vore mod
descriptionHtml:
skeleton replacer for beast race with shield on back, for the devourment mod which is VORE
this is ment for adults only please leave if you are under 18 and or are upset by eating people

please consider this your warning


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------




i suggest using this mod http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17746/?

and this mod http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49784/?

THIS WONT WORK WITHOUT some kind of other mod to work it if you want the shield to go on the back or to wear multiple weapons at once !! its just a skeleton replacer!



i am only posting this so others have easy access to this file please don't ask for a non beast race skeleton ect. ty


please refer all questions and comments about devourment to
http://aryion.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=79&t=36587
author: FoxD
